posts.title: TFL Tube Finder.
posts.description: How can checking a tube status be bearable awesome? Responsive UI, clear application flow, and built for speed. These were the 3 key points I kept in mind when building my version of a tube checker

posts.title: Watch Icons.
posts.description: — I’ll reserve my most severe critque for the folding clasp, which added neither comfort nor functionality to my enjoyment of this watch

posts.title: Chris Makes Web.
posts.description: Making something for youself requires a lot of patience, time + effort. Version 17 turned out best
